name: Just a Ball-Rolling game
description:
General description

This is a simple game in which you control a ball! Your only objective is to maneuver your ball into the square-shaped basket present at the end of each level. Be careful! Falling off of a platform means certain death! There are a total of 8 different levels in this game, each harder than the last. Each level is made up of simple 3D geometric objects, all color-coded by functionality (platforms, enemy, moving platform, etc).

And yes, there is a speedrunning clock. :) Have fun! 

Controls

This game's controls are incredibly simple.

  • WASD or arrow keys: move your ball
  • P: pause the game
  • R: restart the current level
  • Use your mouse or trackpad to interact with the on-screen buttons
